definition: surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

sentences.english: Top notes include bamboo leaf, litchi, Bulgarian rose and violet.
sentences.chinese: 前调有竹叶，荔枝，保加利亚玫瑰和紫罗兰。

sentences.english: The aroma is a complex mix of blackcurrant with liquor ice and violets with hints of a cigar box.
sentences.chinese: 香气是一种混合黑醋栗带有紫罗兰和雪茄盒子的感觉。

sentences.english: All the time, he savoured the gillyflowers in full bloom under my windows.
sentences.chinese: 他一直闻着盛开在我窗下的紫罗兰花香气。

sentences.english: A beautiful bright red colour with violet hints.
sentences.chinese: 酒体呈红宝石色，略显紫罗兰的光泽。

sentences.english: Creamy agate snuff bottle with two small ears on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 紫罗兰色玛瑙鼻烟壶，肩上小耳。

sentences.english: Calendula may mix with lemon slice, peppermint, blue mallow or Verbena.
sentences.chinese: 金盏花可配搭柠檬片，薄荷，紫罗兰或马鞭草。

sentences.english: Purple color, with definite purple-violet lights.
sentences.chinese: 紫色酒体，透出一抹紫罗兰色的光泽。

sentences.english: The the thrushes they were warbling , The violets they were charming.
sentences.chinese: 画眉鸟柔和的唱着歌，还有那娇媚的紫罗兰竞相开放。

sentences.english: Fungus dreg is unsuitable to be the culture medium of the Holy Land violet of rape.
sentences.chinese: 菌渣不适合作圣地紫罗兰油菜的栽培基质。

sentences.english: Two exquisitely crafted Crystal Aurore Boreale and Violet crystal flowers hang gracefully from an intricate centrepiece embellished with clear crystal pavé.
sentences.chinese: 彩白色和紫罗兰色水晶花朵悬挂在透明密镶水晶花上。

sentences.english: A deep ruby red color with tinges of violet.
sentences.chinese: 深沉的红宝石色泽略带紫罗兰光泽。

sentences.english: Many believe purple and its close relative, violet, are colors with grat psychic powers.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为，紫色及其近似紫罗兰色拥有强大的力量。

sentences.english: A pure red ruby colour robe with violet tints.
sentences.chinese: 酒体呈红宝石色，略带紫罗兰的光泽。

sentences.english: I caught a faint odour of violet sachet .
sentences.chinese: 我闻到一股紫罗兰香粉的淡淡的清香味儿。

sentences.english: His second favorite color is violet, but just because it sounds like violent.
sentences.chinese: 他的第二喜爱颜色是紫罗兰色，因为听起来像暴力。

sentences.english: I gently stripped of violet dries up the leaves, and into the water room to play a bit of water.
sentences.chinese: 我轻轻的剥去紫罗兰干枯了的枝叶，到水房打了些水。
